text: Àti pé dájúdájú (Ànábì) Yūsuf ti tọ̀ yín wá ṣíwájú pẹ̀lú àwọn àlàyé ọ̀rọ̀ t’ó yanjú, ṣùgbọ́n ẹ̀yin kò yé wà nínú iyèméjì nípa ohun tí ó mú wá ba yín títí di ìgbà tí ó fi kú, tí ẹ fi wí pé: "Allāhu kò níí gbé Òjíṣẹ́ kan dìde mọ́ lẹ́yìn rẹ̀." Báyẹn ni Allāhu ṣe ń sọ ẹni tí ó jẹ́ aláṣejù, oníyèméjì nù
